word: That which Satan plants in the heart--envy, jealousy, evil surmising, evil speaking, impatience, prejudice, selfishness, covetousness, and vanity--must be uprooted. If these evil things are allowed to remain in the soul, they will bear fruit by which many shall be defiled. Oh, how many cultivate the poisonous plants, that kill out the precious fruits of love and defile the soul!
